Sanskriti School Intra MUN Newsletter- Day 3

Students of Sanskriti school have shown spectacular performance in the Australian National Chemistry Quiz 2017 held on August 23. Out of 77 participants, two students, SHIVANG VERMA of class 8 and KSHITIJ BAJAJ of class 10 have been conferred the HD Excellence award for outstanding performance'. 25 other students are among the top 10% of students of the the state and given the High Distinction award. Congratulations to ALL ! Click here for detailed result​​.
